Uses of Interface
harrypotter.HPActionInterface

  • Packages that use HPActionInterface 
    Package Description
    harrypotter  
    harrypotter.actions  
    harrypotter.interfaces

    • Uses of HPActionInterface in harrypotter

      Classes in harrypotter that implement HPActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HPAction
      Base class for all intransitive commands/Actions in the harrypotter world.
      class  HPAffordance
      Class that represents Affordances in the harrypotter world.
      Methods in harrypotter that return types with arguments of type HPActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<HPActionInterface> HPActor.getActions()
      Returns an ArrayList containing this Actor's available Actions, including the Affordances of items that the Actor is holding.

    • Uses of HPActionInterface in harrypotter.actions

      Classes in harrypotter.actions that implement HPActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Attack
      Command to attack entities.
      class  Cast
      Class that represents a Cast action that can be carried out by a HPActor.
      class  Drink
      HPAction that lets a HPActor drink an object.
      class  Give
      HPAction that lets a HPActor pick up an object.
      class  Leave  
      class  Move
      HPAction that lets HPActors walk around the map.
      class  Take
      HPAction that lets a HPActor pick up an object.

    • Uses of HPActionInterface in harrypotter.interfaces

      Methods in harrypotter.interfaces that return HPActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static HPActionInterface HPGridController.getTargetSpell​(HPActionInterface cast, HPActor a)
      Will return a Spell selected by the user.
      static HPActionInterface HPGridController.getUserDecision​(HPActor a)
      Will return a Action selected by the user.
      static HPActionInterface HPGridController.getUserDecision​(HPActor a, MessageRenderer m)
      Will return a Action selected by the user.
      Methods in harrypotter.interfaces with parameters of type HPActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static HPActionInterface HPGridController.getTargetSpell​(HPActionInterface cast, HPActor a)
      Will return a Spell selected by the user.
